intro.name: Welcome to Cyberpolis
text:
Hello, and thank you for purchasing Cyberpolis.

We hope that you will enjoy the newest and finest game that technology has to offer. The system has undergone some upgrades with the coming of the new ERA. In light of some of the bugs that the game has recently undergone, extra care has been taken to ensure the safety and security of our users. As always, some errors have been fixed and patches have been installed.

For instance, the sun in Winwintar is no longer a giant disco ball, and the class description of Bards no longer reads ‘when the pimp’s in the crib ma, drop it like it’s hot’.

However, the biggest changes come in the form of the technology used to play Cyberpolis.

With our latest VR immersion system, you will now be able to touch, taste, smell, hear, and live the game as though it were real life itself. Cyberpolis is now almost indistinguishable from the real world, allowing you to live out your greatest fantasies and to roleplay a second life.
Thank you once again for choosing to play Cyberpolis. We are certain you will enjoy your stay.

intro2.name: Hometown Selection
text: Welcome, HOTA$$. Please select a hometown.

intro3.name: Loging in ...
text: An excellent choice. You will now be transported to your hometown for the first time. Please hold on as we log you in...

t0.name: Hello HOTA$$.
text: Because the real story has yet to be finished, you will now be launched into a world of whale facts. Did you know that whales have hair? They are mammals after all. The hair is very thin and very light so unless you are seeing one up close you wouldn’t think it was there at all. If you were close enough to a whale to see its hair you would probably be too concerned with your own mortality to fully appreciate it.

t1.name: The Fearsome Ocean
text: Most elephants weigh less than a blue whale's tongue. Imagine now being licked by a whale. Dear god. Baby whales grow at an average rate of 10lbs per hour. Truly terrifying.
next: You want to talk to Saber.

t2.name: Shay
text: The adult male Strap-toothed whale has boar-like tusks on each side of his lower jaw that may become a foot long and wrap around the upper jaw. These tusks can restrict the whale from opening his mouth which is a problem since he has to suck up squid in order to survive. Awkward.

t3.name: Saber
text: Sometimes, as the whales are migrating, they swim very close to the shore and can be seen "blowing" and jumping out of the water. This jumping is called "breaching." Heh. Whales like to hold contests among themselves to see how epic their breaches can be. +10 points for hitting a small ship, +900000 for licking the moon.

t4.name: Amaranth
text: I'm moody and silent. No whale facts.

t5.name: Thirteen
text: You can't wear wristwatches if you are a whale, you know.
next: what does Shay have to say about this?

t6.name: Shay
text: > User is too busy eating ice cream to respond.
